title: TaskFlow Manager
short_description: TaskFlow Manager is a web-based productivity tool designed to help teams manage tasks, track progress, and collaborate efficiently in real-time.
client_feedback: Outstanding UI/UX design and seamless integration of features!

key_features.title: Real-time Collaboration
key_features.desc: Multiple users can edit and track tasks simultaneously.

key_features.title: Progress Analytics
key_features.desc: Visual dashboards to monitor project progress and performance.

key_features.title: Task Automation
key_features.desc: Automated reminders and task scheduling for improved productivity.

key_features.title: Role-based Access
key_features.desc: Custom permissions for admins, managers, and team members.

blog:
# TaskFlow Manager
TaskFlow Manager is a feature-rich web app for efficient task tracking and collaboration. Built with Next.js and Supabase, it ensures real-time updates and secure data handling. Ideal for teams seeking productivity and transparency.
challenges_faced: Ensuring smooth WebSocket synchronization for real-time updates.
lessons_learned: Effective caching and optimistic UI can greatly enhance UX.
description: TaskFlow Manager helps teams collaborate in real time.
It includes analytics, automation, and secure access controls.
Built for scalability and performance using Next.js and Supabase.

title: ShopVerse UI
short_description: ShopVerse UI is a React component library built for eCommerce projects, offering pre-designed elements for stores, product pages, and shopping carts.

key_features.title: Pre-Built eCommerce Components
key_features.desc: Includes product cards, modals, carousels, and checkout forms.

key_features.title: Custom Theme Support
key_features.desc: Easily adaptable design with dark/light mode.

key_features.title: Accessibility First
key_features.desc: All components are accessible and keyboard navigable.

blog:
# ShopVerse UI
ShopVerse UI simplifies eCommerce development by providing ready-to-use, accessible React components. Developers can build scalable online stores faster with clean design and flexible customization options.
challenges_faced: Balancing customization flexibility with design consistency.
lessons_learned: Component abstraction reduces repetition and improves maintainability.
description: ShopVerse UI provides pre-styled components for eCommerce websites.
Includes responsive product and checkout UI elements.
Designed for performance, accessibility, and ease of use.

title: EduPro Learn
short_description: EduPro Learn is an online learning platform for managing courses, lessons, and quizzes with AI-based progress tracking.

key_features.title: Course Management
key_features.desc: Instructors can create, edit, and publish courses easily.

key_features.title: Progress Tracking
key_features.desc: Users can monitor completion rates and achievements.

blog:
# EduPro Learn
EduPro Learn revolutionizes e-learning with intelligent progress tracking and modern UI. Built using Next.js and Prisma, it ensures smooth scalability and secure authentication for learners and instructors.
challenges_faced: Integrating AI-based tracking with traditional course data models.
lessons_learned: Complex relational data benefits from modular schema design.
description: EduPro Learn is an interactive LMS with AI recommendations.
Instructors manage courses, while learners track their progress.
Secure and scalable using Next.js and PostgreSQL.
